Author: kmrlort
Text: It’s just so fucking hard, isn’t it? It sucks losing SO MUCH weight and still being fat. Like, I’ll need to lose another 47 lbs before having a normal BMI of 19. Seeing other people who only need to lose 20 lbs to meet their UGW just make me want to bash my head into the wall. I’m here for you hon, I totally understand the struggle. ☹️

Author: Moderatelyhollydazed
Text: Honestly I have lost over 100lbs and I am still overweight.. fuck me. I am actually only 5lbs below being obese. I'm still fat as fuck.
